generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings, including white dashed lines and a red bike lane with white markings, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures with various architectural styles.
- vegetation: Trees with green and some autumn-colored leaves are visible along the street, particularly on the right side.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black car directly ahead, a white car, and a black SUV on the left side.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign (yield sign) is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole, showing a green light.
